short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A must-have tool for all YouTube lovers!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing our new Chrome extension - a must-have tool for all YouTube lovers! Our extension is designed to extract all available subtitles from YouTube videos and display them directly on the webpage. With just a few clicks, you can easily access all subtitles for any video you watch. Plus, our extension also supports downloading subtitles to your local device for offline viewing.

But that's not all! By logging in to your account, you can also sync all extracted subtitles to your personal database. This way, you can easily access and export your subtitles whenever you need them. Whether you are learning a new language or simply want to better understand a video's content, our extension has got you covered.

Say goodbye to the hassle of searching for subtitles online or struggling to understand a video's audio. Our Chrome extension makes it easy to access and manage all of your subtitles in one place. Download it today and start enjoying all the benefits of easy and seamless YouTube subtitle extraction!
